assessment_item.body: {"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mtf","version":"1.0","templateId":"horizontalMTF"},"data":{"question":{"text":"सम सूत्री कोशिका विभाजन की विभिन्न अवस्थाओं को सुम्मेलित कीजियें -","image":"","audio":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"केन्द्रकीय झिल्ली विलुप्त","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:4063"},{"text":"तर्कु का निर्माण","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:4064"},{"text":"गुणसूत्रों का अलग होना","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:4065"},{"text":"तर्कु विलुप्त","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:4084"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"पूर्वावस्था","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"मध्यावस्था","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"पश्चावस्था","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"अन्त्यावस्था","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4}]},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"category":"MTF","title":"सम सूत्री कोशिका विभाजन की विभिन्न अवस्थाओं को सुम्मेलित किजीयें","language":["Hindi"],"qlevel":"MEDIUM","gradeLevel":["Class 9"],"concepts":[{"identifier":"BIO30000","name":"Human_Welfare"}],"max_score":1},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false},"media":[]}}
